name: Crimetown Depths
overview: Rolling demo of the game, not playable, but worth a watch. Chancellor Jagoo from Murdrum Planet wants to pay you millions but don't ask too many questions and you must teleport immediately, this could be trouble. Crimetown Depths is set on a planet ruled by a despot, where one of the futuristic megacities is now inexorably controlled by crime, so much so that it is nicknamed "Crimetown". The player plays as one of the mercenaries hired to clean up the city. Crimetown has vertical development, a heterogeneous alien population and high-tech structures, but in a dangerous state of decay. The mercenary would have to reach the deepest levels of the city to ferret out the sources of corruption.
